lines.text: I envy you. Convenient memory is a gift from God.
Well, that took you long enough. What'd you do, douche while you were at it?
Ann, you've got some mouth on ya.
You don't wanna know where it's been.

[Angry at John LeTour for being late]
You want me to suck your dick? Fine. You want a raise? No.

[to John]
Quite an erection you have there. I'm dripping.
